thread.title: Video: Scientists use NM to test theory of water flows on Mars

title: Video: Scientists use NM to test theory of water flows on Mars
text: Scientists use NM to test theory of water flows on Mars KOB Albuquerque, NMOct. 14, 2015. 12:27 AM EST The journal "Nature Communications" just published a report about rounded pebbles found in a crat... More » The journal "Nature Communications" just published a report about rounded pebbles found in a crater by the rover "Curiosity." They saw the pebbles became less and less jagged as Curiosity went along, suggesting they were polished tumbling down an ancient river. « Less Tags
